name: Bounce Canyon
description:
Viv is an aspiring stunt woman who wants to bounce as high as she possibly can. However, she has a giant canyon standing in the way of that goal. Draw trampolines by clicking and dragging with the mouse. Don't bounce into a wall, or it's game over!

Special thanks goes to my friend Lily, who tested the game and informed me that the game speed was tied to the monitor's refresh rate. Kinda embarrassing that I didn't think to use delta time to begin with, huh?

The game utilizes some collision algorithms from Jeffery Thompson (specifically line/circle), who allows them to be used in programming projects.

The font used in the game is ManualPrint by Aaron D. Chand, and is free for commercial use.
